name: Lyvely
description: Lyvely is an award-winning SocialFi platform built for the trillion dollar creator and freelancer economy. The ecosystem is powered by our native Utility Token, LVLY, which is an ERC-20 standard, built on the Base network. Lyvely is backed by institutional giants including the Phoenix group, who is public listed and top 5 largest Bitcoin miners in the world. Other institutional investors include M2, the UAE's fully regulated Crypto exchange, and Cypher Capital, a global Web3 VC fund.
